p: Mo concentration in the oil (0.57 mg kg −1) was slightly higher than seeds (0.50 mg kg −1) and higher than flour (0.19 mg kg −1). Pb is a potent pollutant in the atmosphere with a bioaccumulation effect. In all the analysed samples, Pb was abundantly below 200 mg kg −1, which is the safety threshold established by the Regulation EC [ 39].
